#include<stdio.h>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define gc getchar_unlocked // for linux
//#define gc getchar        // for windows
#define LL long long
using namespace std;

int inp()   //Signed long long data type
{
	int n=0;
	int ch=gc();int sign=1;
	while( ch < '0' || ch > '9' ){if(ch=='-')sign=-1; ch=gc();}
	while( ch >= '0' && ch <= '9' )
	n = (n<<3)+(n<<1) + ch-'0', ch=gc();
	return(n*sign);
}
void scanint(int &x)  // Unsigned int data type
{
    register int c = gc();
    x = 0;
    for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
}
void scanlong(long long &x)     //Unsigned long long data type
{
    register long long c = gc();
    x = 0;
    for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
}

int main()
{
	int t;
	LL n,m;
	scanint(t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanlong(n);
		scanlong(m);
		int num,den;
		num=1;
		den=1;
		int index=1;
		while(index<n)
		{
			num=num+den;
			num=num%m;
			den=num+den;
			den=den%m;
			index++;
		}
		printf("%d/%d\n",num,den);
	}
	return 0;
}
